statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE interest_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE interest_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, preference_score FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score > 80 AND interest_category IN ('Sports', 'Technology');
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, preference_score FROM customer_preferences WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR last_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY customer_id, preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE interest = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE interest = 'Technology' AND customer_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Spring%' OR campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_interests FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_interests @> '["sports"]'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT customers.customer_name, customer_preferences.preference_name FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM campaigns JOIN customer_preferences ON campaigns.campaign_id = customer_preferences.pref_id GROUP BY campaign_name
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, name, status FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT content, sent_date FROM Messages WHERE customer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 1;
SELECT name AS CustomerName, email AS CustomerEmail FROM Customers WHERE interests = 'Sports';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE interests LIKE '%shopping%';
SELECT message_id, content, sent_date FROM Messages WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT name, start_date, status FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers INNER JOIN Interests ON Customers.interests = Interests.name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE interests @> '{"category":"sports"}';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, status FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;

SELECT customers.customer_name, interests.interest_name FROM customers JOIN customer_interests ON customers.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id JOIN interests ON customer_interests.interest_id = interests.interest_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';

SELECT customers.customer_name, campaigns.campaign_name, interests.interest_name FROM customers JOIN campaign_customers ON customers.customer_id = campaign_customers.customer_id JOIN campaigns ON campaign_customers.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id JOIN customer_interests ON customers.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id JOIN interests ON customer_interests.interest_id = interests.interest_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3;
